note.p: Birth: Moimenta da Serra, Guarda, Portugal, Europe (21 March 1702)

Career: Advocate of Newtonian principals; demonstrated his steam engine, based on that of Thomas Savery, to the Portuguese court in Lisbon (1742); tried and found guilty by the Inquisition based on his invention; imprisoned in Junqueira Prison, Lisbon
